description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the Connecticut Valley in Massachusetts (by N. B. Sylvester), with illustrations and biographical sketches of some of its prominent men and pioneers [by other authors]" Author: SYLVESTER, Nathaniel Bartlett.
